feed.title: SAP Community - SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud
feed.subtitle: SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Title: API for Supplier Master and Supplier Bank Account maintenance in S/4HANA Public Cloud Edition
entry.content:
Title: API for Supplier Master and Supplier Bank Account maintenance in S/4HANA Public Cloud Edition

Question:

Hello SAP Community,

I am working on an S/4HANA Public Cloud Edition implementation project and would like to know if there are APIs available for the following:

Supplier Master creation and update - Is there an API (OData or SOAP) to create and update Supplier Master records in S/4HANA Public Cloud Edition?
Supplier Bank Account maintenance - If a Supplier Master API exists, does it also support creating and updating the Supplier's Bank Account information? Or is there a separate API for maintaining Supplier Bank Accounts?
We are planning to integrate with an external system and need to programmatically maintain supplier data including their banking details.

Any information about API names, API Hub references, or documentation links would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you in advance for your help.

Best regards

entry.title: Missing Contract Type ORI3 in “Manage Condition Contracts – Royalties” for Scope Item 55I
entry.content:
I am currently trying to configure the 55I – Royalties Management scope item, but I am facing an issue with the availability of contract types.

I am implementing the 55I – Royalties Management scope item in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition and I noticed that the contract type ORI3 – Royalties Intercompany Revenue Recognition is not available in the app “Manage Condition Contracts – Royalties”.

The only contract types visible in Public Cloud are the supplier-related ones (ORS1, ORS2, ORS3, ORS4).

My question is:
Is the ORI3 contract type available in Public Cloud?
If it is supported in Public Cloud, is there any missing configuration to have the ORI1/ORI2 and ORI3 contract types available in the mentioned app (Manage Condition Contracts)?

Thanks a lot

entry.title: Accounting position text
entry.content:
Good afternoon,

I work with SAP Public Cloud, and I was viewing an entry that may come from a subsequent charge or a goods receipt, and when modifying the position text in the accounting entry itself, all G/L accounts except for 3* can be modified. Does anyone know why this is? I can't figure it out. (photo attached)

Thanks in advance. Best regards.

Juan Antonio Moyano

entry.title: SAP Outbound Delivery Postgoodsissue BOI
entry.content:
Hi experts,

Is there a BOI (Business Object Interface) for posting goods issue for outbound delivery, instead of using an API?


Thanks advance
JamesG

entry.title: Statutory report: Reports Enabled for Electronic Submission
entry.content:
Electronic submission of statutory report Romania VAT 300 Declaration is not available for cloud service.

entry.title: How to use 「Scrap in %」in Routing master
entry.content:
In Routing master ,there is「Scrap in %」in General data.

If I set it,I want to know things below.

・In what kind of case,this 「Scrap in %」should be used.

・How production order and production cost will be affacted if this 「Scrap in %」is set.

entry.title: Error When Logging into CBC
entry.content:
When trying to log into CBC, I encountered an error as shown in the attached image. At that time, clicking the "ayge3zpo2.accounts.cloud.sap" link allowed the error to be resolved, but I have a few concerns and would like to ask some questions.

1. When such an error occurs, does each user need to go into CBC and click the link themselves? If there is a way for an administrator to resolve the error collectively, please let me know.

2. When this error occurs, if there are other items that may be affected, please let me know if you are aware of any.

3.What triggered the error?

Environment: partner demo environment

entry.title: Actual Cost Accounting and Moving Average Cost
entry.content:
Does SAP's actual cost accounting only calculate items with standard cost settings?
How are items with moving average cost settings calculated when they are mixed with other items?

entry.title: Is it possible to use Account Assignment Category ‘Q’ for Customer Projects in SAP S/4 PUC
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community, 

I want to use Account Assignment Category ‘Q’ for Customer Projects instead of "P" in SAP S/4Hana Public Cloud. 
It is possible?
I tried a to create a PO with a Account Assignment Category ‘Q’ - Its showing "WBS element has different inventory valuation
Message no. CN769" 

Kindly Let me know if it works or not

Thank you!

Regards,
Vinod.

entry.title: Cancel Billing Document Of Last Month
entry.content:
Hi dears,
I am facing a problem of cancelling billing document.
I want to cancel billing documents which were created last month or the month before last. The account period is only open this month. I want to set the billing date this month.
When I use the app [Manage Billing Documents] (Public Cloud Edition), and press the button [Cancel Billing Document], there is no place to enter the date like below.
Because past months are closed, the account document cannot post.
Is there any way to set date of this month, just press button [Cancel Biling Document] or some other buttons?
Some other app is also OK. 
The customer wants to handle cancel billing document simply.



SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 
#Cancel Billing Document
#Billing Document

entry.title: In sap public cloud check stock based on WBS
entry.content:
hi all,

is there a tile to check stock based on the WBS element in sap public cloud?

entry.title: Unable to change status of an order to not relevant
entry.content: The sales order was invoiced and the invoice was later cancelled. We now need to update the sales order so that it is marked as not relevant for billing. However order contains approximately 780 line items and when attempting to reject the items , a communication error is occuring. Could you please advice if there is alternative way to set the sales orderas not billing relevant so that it no longer appears in the Create Billing Documents App. This is an order related billing scenario.

entry.title: Asset Depreciation Key Change in Public Cloud
entry.content:
I want to change from a depreciation key that calculates using depreciation to the day, to use a depreciation key without that setting but I get these errors:

  • AB720    Enter a depreciation key with 'depreciation by days' such as &1
  • AB721    Use a depreciation key without calculation to the day, such as &1

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: Why is the "create button" not displayed in CDSView?
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

The "create button" is not displayed in the Custom CDS Views (F1866A) application. How can I resolve this?

- The Create, Copy, and Delete buttons are not displayed.

- The buttons are normally displayed in other companies' environments.

 

The following roles have been assigned to users to use Custom CDS Views (F1866A):
- SAP_BR_ANALYTICS_SPECIALIST
- SAP_BR_EXTENSIBILITY_SPEC

The access catalogs for each are as follows:

Please give me your advice.
Thanks best regards.
Akira Matsuda

entry.title: Is there a way to change multiple Incomplete Sales Orders to Complete Sales Orders at once?
entry.content:
Assuming that multiple Incomplete Sales Orders were created due to the same issue, I would like to know if there is a way to change them to Sales Orders at once after resolving the issue.

There are apps and functions that allow bulk creation of Delivery Orders, Goods Issue, and Billing Documents, so I am wondering if changing Incomplete Sales Orders to Sales Orders can also be done in bulk.

entry.title: Custom Adobe Form How to Print 7 Outputs with Different Copy Labels in SAP S/4 HANA Public Cloud
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

I am working on SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud, and I have a requirement in a custom Adobe Form for SD invoices. The business needs to print 7 copies of the same invoice form.

In the Master Form Header of each copy, we must display a specific label :-

1) Copy 1 :- Original for Recipient

2) Copy 2 :- Duplicate for Transporter

3) Copy 3 :- Triplicate for Supplier

4) Copy 4 To 7 :- Extra Copy

Has anyone implemented multiple 7 output prints for a Custom Adobe Form in S/4HANA Public Cloud?
Any guidance or best practices on how to achieve this requirement would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you,

entry.title: Custom CDS view for 4JJ Scope item
entry.content:
Hi Team,

I am currently working on mass creation of time sheet entries (4JJ) using SAP BTP Business Process Automation. For this scenario, I need to create a custom CDS view (YY1_TIME_BILL_STATUS).

My initial plan was to use the standard CDS view I_RRBCostDynamicItem as the primary data source. However, I have learned that this view is deprecated and not released, since it belongs to the old Intercompany Billing (ICO) solution. The only field I require from this view is RRBDynamicItem.

Given that I_RRBCostDynamicItem is no longer available, I would like to know how best to replace this field in line with the new ICO solution. Specifically:

  • Can the BillingDocumentItem field from the I_BillingDocumentItem CDS view be used as a replacement for RRBDynamicItem in my scenario?
  • Is this the recommended approach for building the custom CDS view?

    Any guidance or best practices on how to adapt this requirement to the new ICO solution would be greatly appreciated.

     

    Regards,

    Gunadharshini

entry.title: Integration set up for Planon for S/4 HANA Public Cloud
entry.content:
We are trying to integrate Planon to S/4 HANA. I have already done the setup in BTP and S4 Public Cloud (MDI tenant, Distribution Models, Comm Arr, Destination etc).

Now, Planon is asking me these information:

NameDescriptionExample
accountingNotificationIflowComplete URL of the iflow Notification service for financial collection../http/logsys/AcctgNotification
odmPathODM Path (BTP) to construct the endpointv1/odm
s4hanaSystemForNotificationsHTTP header to identify the system,to routh the notification to the correct S/4HANA systemQJ7XXXXX
serviceRoot
Service root for solution endpoint. Service root should not end with "/"……/http/oxo

Can help me how to find these information so I can provide them to Planon team?

entry.title: Decimal amount in WIP Acc Rev post 0L & 2L.
entry.content:
Hello Team,

There is an issue regarding balance amount post Period end closing activity [0L & 2L] in Run Revenue Recognition app.

Post this activity, there should be ZERO amount under WIP Acc Rev lever, however it's showing some minimal decimal value & this is happening almost for all Projects.
